trends: There has been one other sighting in Orleans
There were no other sightings in Orleans on or around December 9th 2009
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: Bright star like object in the sky slowly moving.
divs: Sighting DetailsI arrived at home, I was taking out the trash. I always look at the sky to see the stars then, I saw a Bright star like object in the sky slowly moving. I ran inside grabbed my camera an took pictures of the object. I had to use the viewfinder and hold one eye open in order to take the pictures. When I looked at the pictures they were much different than what I witnessed. I first notice the object I thought military, drone. The object seemed to be very bright then dim as if it went away. Then it seemed to just keep on moving west. I felt a bit nervous after seeing and taking pictures of the object. I went back inside and my daughter looked at me and smiled.
